comments.body: I wonder `message_filtering_match_values` should be a `set` instead, this can improve performance quite a bit since the check is in a pretty tight loop.
Thanks for the feedback, I did not think of that. Fixed

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +88,92 @@            if not isinstance(message_filtering_match_values, set):
                message_filtering_match_values = set(message_filtering_match_values)
        self.message_filtering_match_values = message_filtering_match_values

        if self.message_filtering == 'literal':
